矮人领袖，如果我们真的是在与亚马逊人打交道，那现在就引出了新的问题：如果你不是克瑞乌萨，你们也不是新银河姐妹会派来的，那你是什么人？或者说，你是什么东西？

What’s the matter Daiyu? Don’t you recognize your Empress anymore? Did you not want to thank me for liberating our people from CORE, for executing what your pathetic First Minister would have never dared to consider?
戴雨，你怎么了？你连你的女皇都认不出来了吗？你难道不想感谢我把我们的人民从“核心”的手中解放出来，感谢我做到了你们那可悲的首席部长连想都不敢想的事情吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating "Empress Carminia".
A short slumber on a stretcher. Ehhh, gawek! We cut you open and waste your soul in a game of interdimensional poker. You will only feel a slight sting. Hooonk, eh ehh!
在担架上小睡一会儿。呃啊，叽叽叽！我们要在一场跨纬度的扑克游戏中把你切开，然后挥霍掉你的灵魂。你只会感受到一丝叮咬。嚯嚯，呃啊啊！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating a "Dire Penguin", an in game unit.

The man, the legend, the Mah Reg’Nib. You may have heard my stories, read my many reports. You asked yourself, who is this person that seems to have appeared at so many key events throughout centuries of Star Union history? Can there really be only one Mah Reg’Nib or is he the voice of the people that need to be heard?
我是一个传奇，我就是玛·瑞格尼布。你可能听过我的故事，读过许多我的报道。你难道就没有问过自己，这个人到底是谁？他为什么经历了那么多关键的事件，并且跨域了好几个世纪的星际联盟历史？难道真的只有一个玛·瑞格尼布吗？或者说，他代表着人们需要听到的声音？

Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating "Mah Reg'Nib", a supposedly male character of unknown race and origin, who is the source for many unit descriptions and tech quotes in the game.
No, I don’t believe you. You are still hiding your true nature. I can see it in your eyes. They are mocking us, studying us, continuing their game of deception.
不，我不相信你。你还在隐藏自己的本性，我能从你的眼睛里看出来。它们在嘲笑我们，研究我们，继续它们的欺骗游戏。

Maybe you are right, Colonel, and I am not who I told you to be. Maybe everything you perceive is just an illusion and the universe is composed of entities that would defy your understanding of physics in every meaningful way.
也许你是对的，上校，我并不是一开始自称的那个人。也许你所感知的一切都只是一种幻觉，整个宇宙由各种实体构成，而这些实体以各种方式违背了你对物理现象的认知。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating "Daiyu Jiang".
I could be a living crystal…
我可能是一个活体水晶……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating a "Quartzite Crystal Worm" unit.
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
… or even a bacterium inside the stomach of a Tyrannodon.
……或者，甚至是一只暴龙肚子里的细菌。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating a "Xenoplague Pustule" unit.
Or how about a data block on a hard disk, compiled from binary code?
或者是一个硬盘上的数据块，由二进制代码编译而成？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating a "Synthesis Avatar" unit.

That’s it, of course: you are using holograms to alter your appearance! How else could you change to so many different forms and sizes! But why are you doing all this? Why sabotage our reactors and wage a de-facto war on the ELOP Confederation?
没错，就是这样了：你用全息影像改变了你的外观！否则怎么可能变出这么多不同的外貌和身形！但你为什么要这么做？为什么要破坏我们的反应堆？为什么要向星球平等联盟发动战争？
You will find out soon enough, human. You will find out soon enough.
你很快就会知道了，人类。很快。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) Impersonating an "Autonom Justicar" unit.

That’s the last reactor down! I have to admit, Marshal, that your brute force methods turned out to work better than I expected. It is a good thing you showed persistence even when I discarded your ideas.
最后一座反应堆也破坏了！我不得不承认，元帅，你的蛮力方法比我预期的效果还要好。很高兴你能在我拒绝你的提议时坚持己见。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Don’t mention it, General. You did well in weighing all options. It’s what a good Gama needs to do.[br/][br/]But before we celebrate victory, shouldn’t the Void Rift already have collapsed by now?
别客气，将军。你做得很好，你权衡了所有的选择，这正是一名优秀的伽马该有的品质。[br/][br/]但在我们庆祝胜利之前，我们需要先确认一件事情，虚空裂隙为什么还没有崩塌？

With all the reactors down, there is an interesting new development going on over there at the ELOP headquarters, General. One of our listening posts is transmitting live voice recordings to us. You probably want to hear this.
当我们破坏了所有的反应堆之后，星球平等联盟的总部内发生了一件有趣的事情，将军。我们的一个监听站正在传输现场录音，你肯定会对此感兴趣的。

…have known a disaster like this would happen. My nephew warned me about you from the very beginning. Now he is dead and the most important defensive ELOP project at the verge of critical failure. I have no choice but to drive you and your Dvar away from Celaudius-2, Director.
……就知道肯定会发生这样的灾难。我的侄子从一开始就警告过我有关你的事情。现在他已经死了，最重要的星球平等联盟防御计划也处于失败的边缘。我别无选择，只能把你和你的矮人驱逐出克劳迪乌斯 2 号星，矮人领袖。
Story message. Speaker: "Daiyu Jiang" (Vanguard, female) "Nephew" refers to Huy Jiang, a male Vanguard character.

This is an outrage! Our Consortium has invested blood, sweat and machines in this cause, vouching with their lives for your safety. And this is how you repay us? Don’t think we’ll be leaving behind even a scrap of metal that we brought for construction, Colonel. Interfere with our dismounting processes and there will be war!
这简直就是胡来！我们财团在这番事业中投入了血汗和设备，甚至牺牲了他们的生命来保护你们的安全。这就是你报答我们的方式？我们要把带来的建造材料全部带走，哪怕是一小块金属也不会留下，上校。如果你干涉我们的拆卸过程，我们将发动战争！
In that case, you better ready your Bulwarks, Director! These deconstruction plans are just another ruse to buy you the time needed to finish your acts of sabotage. I will not let…
如果这样的话，你最好让手下的筑垒卫士做好准备，矮人领袖！这些拆卸计划只是另一个为你完成破坏行动而拖延时间的诡计罢了。我绝不会让……
Victory doesn’t get any sweeter than this. With the ELOP commanders at each other’s throats, shutting down the reactor core will be little more than a formality…
没有比这更甜蜜的胜利了。星球平等联盟的指挥官想要互相掐死对方，看来彻底关闭反应堆核心将会更加容易……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Take the Rift Reactor Alpha by force and destroy it.
武力夺取并摧毁裂隙反应堆 A。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Keep them coming, General. My troops and I are just getting started.
让他们放马过来吧，将军。我和我的部队才刚刚热完身子。
Take the Rift Reactor Beta by force and destroy it.
武力夺取并摧毁裂隙反应堆 B。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Another great victory for the Domok and the Scarlet Scepter! This is my way of doing diplomacy, General.
多摩克和绯红节杖的又一次伟大胜利！这就是我的外交方式，将军。
Take the Rift Reactor Gamma by force and destroy it.
武力夺取并摧毁裂隙反应堆 G。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
There they say there are problems that cannot be solved with an omni rifle. Fools!
没有什么问题是一把全能步枪解决不了的，笨蛋！
Take the Rift Reactor Delta by force and destroy it.
武力夺取并摧毁裂隙反应堆 D。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
This is a day for Prokarn to remember! It’s only in the heat of battle that true heroes can be forged!
这是值得普罗坎铭记的一天！只有激烈的战斗才能铸造出真正的英雄！
Take the Rift Reactor Epsilon by force and destroy it.
武力夺取并摧毁裂隙反应堆 E。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Sound the invasion, soldiers! Tonight, we light up the heavens!
吹响进攻的号角，士兵！今晚，我们要点亮天空！
That’s it! The reactor core is shutting down. Orbital sensors are confirming that the ELOP Void Storms have started to collapse on themselves.
行了！反应堆核心正在关闭。轨道传感器正在确认，星球平等联盟的虚空风暴已经开始崩塌。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Well done, General! This marks a day for future Shakarn generations to remember. They will all study the sonoscript from the moment we rang in the invasion of the Star Union.
干得漂亮，将军！蜥蜴人未来的世世代代都将铭记这一天。他们将在音波史书中学习从我们入侵星际联盟的那一刻起立下的丰功伟绩。

Now, before you do the honors and contact the Scarlet Scepter, you should choose your weapons for the upcoming war. During this mission our troops got their hands on enough tech to offer you something with a little bit more of a punch.
现在，在你享受荣誉并联系绯红节杖之前，你应该为即将到来的战争选择武器。我们的部队从这次任务中获得了许多技术，可以让你的出击力度变得更加强大。
Thank you, Marshal. You are right: the play time is over. Now we ignite the fires from which Shakarn heroes will be born.[br/][br/]Put me through to Chancellor Kor. We have a galaxy to conquer!
谢谢你，元帅。你说得对：嬉戏打闹的时间结束了。现在，我们将点燃蜥蜴人英雄诞生的烈焰。[br/][br/]请帮我呼叫科尔首相，我们将征服这个银河！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military title of the Shakarn. "Kor" is the last name of a male Shakarn character.

Thank you, Marshal. You are right: the play time is over. Now it is on us to use the Void that the ELOP was so happy to exploit.[br/][br/]Put me through to Chancellor Kor. We have a galaxy to conquer!
谢谢你，元帅。你说得对：嬉戏打闹的时间结束了。现在，轮到我们来使用星球平等联盟最想要利用的虚空科技了。[br/][br/]请帮我呼叫科尔首相，我们将征服这个银河！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military title of the Shakarn. "Kor" is the last name of a male Shakarn character.
Thank you, Marshal. But I still have some Synthesis aces up my sleeve that I want to play during the upcoming conflicts.[br/][br/]Now put me through to Chancellor Kor. We have a galaxy to conquer!
谢谢你，元帅。但我手里还有一些合成技术的王牌没有拿出来，我想在今后的战斗中让它们发挥用武之地。[br/][br/]请帮我呼叫科尔首相，我们将征服这个银河！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military title of the Shakarn. "Kor" is the last name of a male Shakarn character.
Disabling the other generators cleared the voidstorm obscuring this facility. Now you must seize control of this last station to conquer the facility and let the Shakarn fleet through.
在关闭了其他发电机后，虚空风暴散去并露出了这座设施。现在，你必须夺取最后一个站点来征服这座设施，从而让蜥蜴人的舰队顺利通过。

As the void storms break open it reveals a sprawling facility. The enormous Void Reactor Core is embedded in the landscape and has clearly lost dimensional stability as result of the loss of the five anchoring reactor facilities. From where we’re standing now we can clearly see at least one point of entry: The front gate.
随着虚空风暴的崩塌，一座庞大的设施显露出来。巨大的虚空反应堆核心嵌在地面上，由于失去五个其他反应堆设施的支撑，明显已经失去了维度稳定性。从我们现在站的地方，至少可以清楚地看到一个入口：正门。

The front gate is guarded by a small force of Vanguard troops. Elites by the looks of it. We could take them head on no doubt, or we could find another way in. The provided schematics reveal this place was built on ruins and it would stand to reason some of the tunnels and sewers are still accessible.
正门由一小队先锋部队把守，看起来都是精英。毫无疑问，我们可以要了他们的小命，但也可以另寻一条进去的道路。根据情报部门提供的地图，这个地方建立在一处废墟上，因此应该可以从几条隧道和下水道进去。
The time for subtlety has passed, we charge head on! With a gutteral warcry our Domok reveal our presence. The Vanguard troops stand ready. Ready to die.
谨小慎微的日子已经过去了，我们直接正面出击！震耳欲聋的战争怒吼将宣告我们多摩克氏族的到来。先锋部队做好了准备，只不过是做好了去死的准备。
The Vanguard stand ready to defend the entrance, but they stand no chance against the might of the Shakarn.
先锋或许做好了防御入口的准备，但在强大的蜥蜴人面前，他们毫无胜算。

The limp hand of a Vanguard soldier trails off the identification panel - dead like the rest of his comrades. Nothing but death comes the way of those who defy the Shakarn. The heavy door opens slowly. We push onward, for the glory of the Shakarn Empire.
最后一名先锋士兵的双手软弱无力地垂落在了身份验证面板之上，与他的其他同伴一样停止了呼吸。反抗蜥蜴人之辈只有死路一条。沉重的大门缓缓打开。为了蜥蜴人帝国的荣耀，继续向前推进。
Enter through the old ruins under the facility
从设施下方的旧废墟进入
The winding path below the facility is slow and long, but it hides us from those above and helped spare our energy. No doubt we will need it.
设施下方的道路蜿蜒而漫长，但也让我们避开了上方的敌人，从而保存了我们的精力。毫无疑问，这正是我们希望看到的情况。
Access shafts used in construction allow us to enter undetected. As we emerge it is clear we are in the middle of the facility.
从建筑通道进入这座设施使我们在不被发现的情况下悄悄潜入。当我们从通道中走出时，已经置身于设施内部。
We're "convincing" the Therians to do some heavy lifting.
我们正在“说服”兽人帮忙做一些繁重的工作。

Whatever our envoy told these furry fools has incited a near mindless anger in them. With rage filled eyes and foam at the mouths they throw themselves onto the Vanguard with righteous fury. The last brute left standing is easily disposed of, allowing us easy and quick entry into the facility.
无论我们的使者给这些毛茸茸的蠢货说了些什么，这都激起了他们近乎疯狂的愤怒。他们眼含怒火，口吐唾沫，义愤填膺地扑向了先锋部队。我们轻而易举地解决了最后一个野蛮的家伙，轻松地进入了设施。

Once on the inside of the facility, we can clearly see its walls almost warping around us as the result of the dimensional destabilization. It takes mere moments to arrive at a crossroad where we can see three different corridors, all of them going deeper into the facility and all of them showing us twisted visions of different places. The first shows us Kadalos, our homeworld. Its streets are purple with blood. The second shows massive spires of old Star Union design unlike any we’ve seen before. The last shows darkness. Nothing but void.
进入设施内部之后，我们能很清楚地看到这座设施的墙壁由于维度动荡，在我们四周扭曲波动。没过多久，我们便抵达了一个十字路口。三条不同的走廊出现在我们面前，全都通往设施深处，并向我们展示着不同地方的扭曲景象。我们在第一条走廊的景象中看到了卡达洛斯，我们的母星，街道被鲜血染成了紫红色。第二条走廊则是旧星际联盟建造的大型尖塔，我们以前从来没有看见过这样的东西。最后一条走廊则充满了黑暗，除了虚空什么都没有。

Stepping into the corridor takes us right onto a battlefield; the blood, the cries, the deafening explosions of sono-weaponry. This is not present day Kadolos. This is the Second Segregation War. There’s barely any time to let the realization sink in as an explosion goes off close to us and we see a contingent of heavily armed Domok taking aim at us...
进入走廊，我们直接穿越到了一个战场之上。鲜血，叫喊，震耳欲聋的音波武器爆炸。这不是现在的卡达洛斯，而是第二次隔离战争时期。我们还没来得及反应，一枚炸弹在离我们很近的地方轰然炸裂。一支全副武装的多摩克小队正在瞄准我们……
Phase_3_Choice_1_Start of an anomalous site. "Second Segragation War" is the name of a civil war that once happened on the Shakarn home world, Kadalos.
Stepping through the rift has left us on a Kadolos during the Second Segregation War, face-to-face with a contingent of heavily armed Domok seconds away from unleashing hell at us…
这道裂隙让我们来到了第二次隔离战争期间的卡达洛斯，并且遇上了一支全副武装的多摩克部队，很快他们就会朝我们开火……

The opposing Domok fall to the superior tactics of united Shakarn forces but it’s hardly worth calling a victory. We find a way out, through another rift and back into the corridors of the Reactor facility. This is the price our ancestors paid for the schism between castes.
在蜥蜴人联合部队卓越的战术下，敌对的多摩克部队败下阵来，但我们并不想将这称为一次胜利。我们找到了一条出路，穿过另一条裂隙回到了反应堆设施的走廊。这就是我们的祖先为氏族之间的分裂所付出的代价。

We emerge from the portal and find ourselves on what is undeniably Union Prime, back when the Star Union was still at its peak. Though none of us makes mention of it, we all stand marveling at the grand spires and architecture for a moment. A moment followed by confusion as the urban environment is nothing short of a maze.
当我们从传送门走出时，发现自己正身处联盟主星，那时的星际联盟毫无疑问正处于巅峰时期。虽然我们谁也没有说出口，但我们都站在那里，惊叹于宏伟的尖塔和建筑。随之而来的就是困惑，因为这里的城市环境简直就像是一个迷宫。

The amazement at the grand construction is quickly replaced by annoyance when it takes us a long time to find our way through the sprawling maze of Union Prime. Finally, we found ourselves back outside the rift, re-emerging at the Reactor facility.
起初对宏伟建筑的惊讶很快就被烦恼所取代，我们花了很长一段时间才在错综复杂的联盟主星迷宫中找到了出路。最后，我们又回到了裂隙之外，重新出现在了反应堆设施中。

Only fools fear the dark - and we are no fools. Still, we see creatures move at the edge of our vision, we hear voices whisper promises of great power, and our hero says they were even offered the “Gift of Psynumbra” to help destroy our enemies. Despite finding our way out safely none of us can deny being unnerved.
只有傻瓜才害怕黑暗，而我们不是傻瓜。尽管如此，我们看到一些生物在视野的边缘移动。我们听到了些许低语，承诺给予我们强大的力量，我们的英雄甚至说他们能够获得“赛努布拉的馈赠”来摧毁敌人。尽管我们最后找到了安全的出路，但没有人能否认我们刚才的紧张与不安。

Only fools fear the dark - and we are no fools. Still, we see creatures move at the edge of our vision, we hear voices whisper promises of great power, and our hero says they were even offered the “Gift of Psynumbra” to help destroy our enemies. As we emerge from the dark we find ourselves with fewer in number. Perhaps there is something to fear in this void after all…
只有傻瓜才害怕黑暗，而我们不是傻瓜。尽管如此，我们看到一些生物在视野的边缘移动。我们听到了些许低语，承诺给予我们强大的力量，我们的英雄甚至说他们能够获得“赛努布拉的馈赠”来摧毁敌人。当我们从黑暗中回来之后，发现有一些同伴竟然失踪了。也许，这片虚空中还是有一些值得我们害怕的东西……

We quickly determined our new position, and it is clear after a single glance that we are near the facility's core - only a set of massive doors bars our way now... Before we can do much more than take a step forward, a hologram springs to life. A hologram powered by Shakarn technology, displaying a human woman dressed in what can only be described as queenly regalia.
我们就很快就确定了自己所在的位置，显然我们已经十分接近设施的核心区域了，两扇庞大的巨门挡住了我们的去路……我们才向前迈了一步，一幅全息影像就出现在了我们面前。这幅全息影像由蜥蜴人技术驱动，影像上是一个人类女性。从她的穿着来看，应该是一名女皇。
The warning we just received still weighs on our minds, but we have come too far to turn back now. We all know what must be done.
虽然刚刚的警告仍然压在心头，但我们已经不能回头了。我们都很清楚我们必须完成的任务。
It is no threat, let it speak
没什么威胁，听听影像要说什么

The two massive doors slide open in an almost hauntingly quiet fashion, revealing the facility’s inner-core halls: a massive, wide open space containing the Reactor Core. Floating all around the room are strange creatures that almost look too real. They are fighting not one, but two vague and flickering armies, one Vanguard, the other one Zhelezo Dvar. The void instability is keeping two separate realities intact, and it seems we have to choose which of the two to make ours.
两扇巨大的门缓缓打开，却没有发出任何声响。里面露出了设施的核心大厅，一个宽阔的开放空间，反应堆核心就在其中。房间里四处漂浮着奇怪的生物，他们看起来太真实了。两支模糊不清、忽隐忽现的部队正在与它们交战：一支是先锋，另一支则是泽勒佐矮人。虚空动荡使两个相互独立的现实保持着完整，看来我们必须在两者之间做出选择。
Phase_5_Start of an anomalous site. "Strange creatures" refers to the Voidbringer units.
The Vanguard's elite must be the correct reality
先锋精英一定是正确的现实
As we set our sights on the Vanguard, they come fully into focus and the Dvar vanish from our sight. If there is any surprise on their side, they don’t show it while they quickly fall into formation.
当我们将视线放在先锋部队上时，他们突然汇聚显现，而另一边的矮人则从我们的视线中消失了。即使他们对眼前的情形感到惊讶，他们也没有表现出来，因为他们很快便摆好了战斗阵型。
The Vanguard Elite are ready for anything. The floating creatures are tearing into our reality. Both forces must be eliminated if we are to reach our goal. This will not be easy, but we must prevail.
先锋精英蓄势待发。漂浮的生物正在撕裂我们的现实。如果我们想要完成目标，我们必须将这两股力量全部消灭。这并非一件易事，但我们必须胜利。

We prevailed through superior tactics and strength. Neither the Vanguard, nor the strange creatures were able to stop us. All that is left is the core. Disabling its regulators causes a cascade failure in the containment field. We flee as the void rips into the facility around us, tearing more and more of our reality away. By the time our armies are all evacuated and well outside of the facility, the final collapse of the core pulls it into the Void in a final, deafening roar.
我们以高超的战术和力量取得了胜利，先锋和那些奇怪的生物无法阻止我们。剩下的就只有核心了。关闭核心调节器使抑制力场出现了大面积故障。当虚空撕裂我们周围的设施时，我们逃了出来，越来越多的现实被撕成了碎片。当我们的军队全部撤离到了设施外很远的地方时，核心的最终崩塌将整座设施拉进了虚空，震耳的呼啸响彻苍穹。
The Zhelezo Dvar elite must be the correct reality
泽勒佐矮人精英一定是正确的现实

As we set our sights on the Zhelezo Dvar, they come fully into focus and the Vanguard vanish from our sight. If there is any surprise on their side, they don’t show it while they quickly fall into formation.
当我们将视线放在泽勒佐矮人部队上时，他们突然汇聚显现，而另一边的先锋则从我们的视线中消失了。即使他们对眼前的情形感到惊讶，他们也没有表现出来，因为他们很快便摆好了战斗阵型。

The Dvar Ursine Guard are ready for anything. The floating creatures are tearing into our reality. Both forces must be eliminated if we are to reach our goal. This will not be easy, but we must prevail.
矮人熊卫士势待发。漂浮的生物正在撕裂我们的现实。如果我们想要完成目标，我们必须将这两股力量全部消灭。这并非一件易事，但我们必须胜利。

We prevailed through superior tactics and strength. Neither the Dvar, nor the strange creatures were able to stop us. All that is left is the core. Disabling its regulators causes a cascade failure in the containment field. We flee as the void rips into the facility around us, tearing more and more of our reality away. By the time our armies are all evacuated and well outside of the facility, the final collapse of the core pulls it into the Void in a final, deafening roar.
我们以高超的战术和力量取得了胜利，矮人和那些奇怪的生物无法阻止我们。剩下的就只有核心了。关闭核心调节器使抑制力场出现了大面积故障。当虚空撕裂我们周围的设施时，我们逃了出来，越来越多的现实被撕成了碎片。当我们的军队全部撤离到了设施外很远的地方时，核心的最终崩塌将整座设施拉进了虚空，震耳的呼啸响彻苍穹。
Director Stanizoid… ambushed by lizard people… defensive protocol R9-DV red!
斯坦尼佐德领袖……遭到蜥蜴人伏击……R9-DV 红色防御协议！

Baroness Valjura! No![br/][br/]Comrades of the Zhelezo Consortium, stand strong. This is the moment we’ve been preparing for. Let the Excavators ready their cannons and the Trenchers man the ditch. This is war!
瓦尤拉男爵！不！[br/][br/]泽勒佐财团的兄弟姐妹们，请务必坚强。这是我们一直在准备的时刻。准备好挖掘者坦克的火炮，让挖掘者在壕沟中就位。战争开始了！
Story message. Speaker: "Stanizoid Zhelezo" (Dvar, male) "Excavator" and "Trencher" are the names of in game Dvar units.
An alien ambush? This is grave news, Director. My troopers are already entering overwatch. We are in this together!
外星人伏击？这可是个重磅消息，矮人领袖。我的部队已经进入警戒状态，让我们共同作战！
Story message. Speaker: "Daiyu Jiang" (Vanguard, female) "overwatch" is the name of an in game combat mechanic.
Great work, Marshal. So much for our stealth plans…
干得好，元帅。我们的隐秘计划到此为止……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Director Stanizoid… ambushed by the Amazon… are not… protocol R9-… red!
斯坦尼佐德领袖……遭到亚马逊人伏击……他们不是……R9……红色防御协议！
Watch out, Aunt Daiyu… ambushed by the Amazon… behind everything…
当心，戴雨姑妈……遭到亚马逊人伏击……幕后黑手是……
Huy, no! Why did I let him scout ahead into hostile territory like this? I curse you, Matron – or whatever your actual title is!
辉，不！我为什么要让他去侦察敌方领地？我诅咒你，族长——或者，我甚至根本不应该这样称呼你！
Story message. Speaker: "Daiyu Jiang" (Vanguard, female) "Matron" is a title of the Amazon.

We had an interplanetary transmission this morning, talking to the real Creusa of Oran. She told us what this Dvar had suspected from the very beginning: there had never been any terraforming shipment sent out to Thanakiwa. Amazon hag!
今天早上，我们与真正的克瑞乌萨进行了星际通讯。她确认了一件我身边的这位矮人从一开始就怀疑的事情：从来就没有任何运往瑟纳基瓦的环境改造物资，亚马逊巫婆！
Story message. Speaker: "Stanizoid Zhelezo" (Dvar, male) "Creusa of Oran" is the name of an Amazon female character that Naranga Od is impersonating in this mission (see dialogues further below).
Follow the Call of the Abyss (Switch to Psynumbra)
听从深渊的呼唤（切换至赛努布拉）
Thank you, Marshal. But I have decided to tap into a different source of power… The promise of Lohikarne awaits.[br/][br/]Now put me through to Chancellor Kor. We have a galaxy to conquer!
谢谢你，元帅。但我已决定深入研究另一种力量……洛西卡恩的承诺在等待着我。[br/][br/]请帮我呼叫科尔首相，我们将征服这个银河！

Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Lohikarne" is the name of a Psynumbra demon. "Chancellor" is a military title of the Shakarn. "Kor" is the last name of a male Shakarn character.

In many cultures it is deemed inappropriate to shoot the messenger. Luckily, as a hologram, I don’t have to care.[br/][br/]Agents of the Scarlet Scepter! Listen to my words of warning, and weigh your options before you go in and complete this mission that can only bring doom to this galaxy.
在许多文化中，射杀信使通常是不恰当的行为。幸运的是，身为全息影像的我并不在乎这一点。[br/][br/]绯红节杖的特工们！听从我的警告，在你们进去完成所谓的任务之前，请先权衡你们的选择，因为这项任务只会给这个银河带来厄运。
Story message. Speaker: "Empress Carminia" (human, female) represented by a hologram.
Halt, agents of the Scarlet Scepter! Listen to my words of warning, and weigh your options before you go in and complete this mission that can only bring doom to this galaxy.
停下脚步，绯红节杖的特工们！听从我的警告，在你们进去完成所谓的任务之前，请先权衡你们的选择，因为这项任务只会给这个银河带来厄运。
Story message. Speaker: "Empress Carminia" (human, female) represented by a hologram.

Do not be surprised by my knowledge of Shakarn language and technology. Did you truly think that your centuries of spying and scheming would go unnoticed in an empire that managed to surveil billions of citizens, following them right into their minds, if necessary? Careless thoughts do cost lives.
不要对我熟知蜥蜴人的语言和技术而感到惊讶。这个庞大的帝国监视着数十亿居民，在必要时甚至能够直接窥探他们的心灵。你们真的以为你们几个世纪以来的间谍和阴谋行动从未被人发现？粗心大意的确要付出生命的代价。

Story message. Speaker: "Empress Carminia" (human, female) represented by a hologram. "Careless thoughts do cost lives." is a reference to the Psynumbra propaganda slogan "Careless thoughts cost lives."

Since I became Empress of the Star Union, I have lived in all the possible futures, the good ones and the bad ones. I have seen universes collapsing and others coming into creation. After everything that happened, it would seem that I should no longer care about the fate of this galaxy in this particular reality. But I do.
自从我成为星际联盟的女皇后，我就经历了未来所有的可能性，无论好坏。我曾经看见过崩塌的宇宙，但也看到了新宇宙的诞生。在发生了这一切之后，我似乎不应该再关心这个银河在这一现实中的命运。但我做不到。
Story message. Speaker: "Empress Carminia" (human, female) represented by a hologram.

If you walk down this corridor and destroy the rift generator, it will be your people’s downfall. There are things beyond the veil that are older than matter and time. It is folly to open the gates of hell, and he who wanders too far from home shall never return to his soil, save in death.
如果你们继续沿着这条走廊走下去并摧毁裂隙生成器，面临陨落的将会是你们的人民。神秘的帷幕之外，还有比物质和时间更为古老的事物。打开地狱之门是愚蠢的行为，而离家太远之人将永远不会返回他的故土，除非死亡。
Story message. Speaker: "Empress Carminia" (human, female) represented by a hologram. "Beyond the veil" is a reference to the Abyss.

The hologram has shut down. How in the name of Prokarn did this Empress, who is supposed to be dead, manage to steal one of our holo-projectors, repurpose it for her own use, and place it here at the exactly right location and time? This could single-handedly challenge all the planning and assumptions that this invasion program was founded on. What do you think, Marshal?
全息影像关闭了。普罗坎在上啊，这个早就应该死去的女皇究竟是如何偷走了我们的全息投影仪，还将其纳为己用，然后把它放在了这里，在如此准确的时间和地点出现在了我们面前？光是这一点就能撼动这次入侵的所有计划和假设了。你怎么看，元帅？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

It’s a ruse, General. It has to be. The ELOP commanders must have gotten hold of one of our agents, and put down this last-minute plan to counter all our efforts. They used the specifications of their last Empress to make their fake message carry the necessary weight. If we back out now, it will be their victory!
这是个诡计，将军。一定是诡计。肯定是星球平等联盟的指挥官抓住了我们的特工，然后布下了这个计划来阻挠我们的努力。他们用已经死去的女皇特征使这条虚假的消息看上去像是真的一样。如果我们现在后退，等于是将胜利拱手让人！
A header name of a task.

Run with the pack, {STR_LeaderName}. Fancy scales you’re wearing! You could really spice up the mix in our free Therian commune: we’ve already got wolves and foxes and bunnies and even squirrels, but we’ve never run into any reptile anthropomorphs before. Did Terratech pull a trick on you as well, or where did you come from?
加入我族吧，{STR_LeaderName}。你身上的鳞片真好看！你真的可以为我们自由的兽人社群带来一些有趣的元素：我们已经有了狼、狐狸、兔子甚至松鼠，但从未遇到过两栖的爬行类人生物。你也是泰拉科技的实验产物？否则的话，你是从哪里来的？
I... uhh... would prefer to not talk about it for now. What are you people doing on this remote moon anyway? We thought it would be deserted.
我……呃……现在不想谈论这件事。你们这一族的人在这个遥远的星球上干什么呢？我们以为这里早就已经荒废了。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Trying to keep a low profile as well, eh? That’s understandable. We also didn’t want to cause any ruckus when coming back to the Star Union. No interest in any more fox hunts or freak shows, no. So we landed our treasure ship on this chilled rock. Took a laugh at the Paragon, and now we’re gonna dig for some awesome bones or diamonds.
你们不想太过张扬，是吗？嗯，可以理解。当我们回到星际联盟的时候，也不想造成任何骚动。我们不再对猎杀狐狸或是畸形动物秀感兴趣了，再也不会了。于是，我们便把宝藏船降落在了这片冰冷的土地上。在嘲笑了一番完人之后，我们现在要去挖一些好骨头或是钻石了。

But since you’re here now, maybe you’ll be able to help us? We found one of the Alteration Labs, where our ancestors received their treatments of the Therian Panacea. We wanted to enter, but these days there is all kinds of mutated goo lurking in there. If you destroy the goo, we may be able to find traces of our first leader Deer.
但你既然来了，也许能帮助我们？我们发现了一个改造实验室，我们的祖先曾在这种实验室里接种了兽人万能药。我们想进去一探究竟，但最近有各种各样的变异尸鬼潜伏在里面。如果你能干掉那些尸鬼，我们也许就能找到第一任领袖圣鹿的踪迹。

Story message. Speaker: "Therian Sharpshooter" (Therian, male) "Therian Panacea" is the name of a medicine that slowly transformed people into animal-hybrids. For "Deer" see the corresponding glossary entry.
Correct me if I’m wrong, General, but aren’t these from the same breed of odd pirates that occasionally had to be snuffed off our border planets during the past few years?
将军，如果我说错了的话请纠正我。在过去的几年里，我们的边境星球偶尔会消灭一些奇怪的海盗。这些兽人跟那些海盗不都是同一族的吗？

They are, Marshal. But we shouldn’t just directly let them in on that, should we... While they’ve proven to be annoying in the past, I have a feeling that this time around these Therians might become useful for us.
你说的没错，元帅。但我们不能直接让他们知道这一点，不是吗……尽管他们过去很烦人，但我有预感，这次我们也许可以利用这些兽人。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

The Therians have asked you to clear the Therian Alteration Labs, where Terratech knowledge of the Therian's first leader "Deer" may be stored. Though there doesn't seem to be any immediate benefit, you have decided to play it nice, for now.
兽人请求你帮忙清理兽人改造实验室，那里可能储存着关于兽人第一任领袖“圣鹿”的泰拉科技知识。虽然这件事似乎不会带来任何直接的好处，但你决定目前要向兽人示好。

Woohoo, good job, team scaly boys! Now we can trawl through the Terratech servers to look for a treatment. Did I say treatment? Oopsie… So we weren’t completely honest with you. As in, we lied. The reason that we needed to get into the lab is that we ran into these strange glowy fish on our last planet that really gave us the creeps.
哦吼，干得好，长着鳞片的家伙们！现在我们可以在泰拉科技的服务器上寻找治疗的方法了。我刚才是不是说了治疗？哎呀，糟了……其实，我们没有对你们完全说实话。好吧，我们撒谎了。我们之所以想要进入实验室，是因为我们在上一个星球遇到了一些奇怪的发光鱼，它们让我们毛骨悚然。

Not even an elder octowhale is nearly as scary as what we saw. So we hopped into our treasure ship as fast as we could. But it was already too late and some of our pack got this jelly parasite stuck on their heads. We were hoping to find a treatment in the labs here, but now our diseased companions ran off, as if driven by some crazy instinct.
就算是一头年长的八爪鲸也不如我们看到的景象那样可怕，所以我们以最快的速度跳进了宝藏船。但已经太迟了，我们的一些同伴头上还粘着这种水母的寄生虫。我们希望能在这里的实验室里找到治疗的方法。可是现在，我们患病的同伴仿佛被某种疯狂的本能驱使，纷纷从族群中逃跑。
Story message. Speaker: "Therian Sharpshooter" (Therian, male) "Elder Octowhale" is the name of a unit in the game. "Jelly parasite" refers to the parasite used by the Voidbringers to enthrall units.

That’s when we noticed some of the jelly had grown into new glowy fish. We know our way around fleas and lice, but this parasite problem is literally becoming a real headache. Please hunt them down and put our poor companions to rest!
那时我们才注意到，一些水母已经长成了新的发光鱼。我们知道如何对付跳蚤和虱子，但这一寄生虫问题真的很令人头疼。请帮助我们追捕那些可怜的同伴，让他们安息吧！
Story message. Speaker: "Therian Sharpshooter" (Therian, male) "Glowy fish" refers to the Voidbringer units.
Kill the "glowy fish" that have been harassing the Therians since they landed on their last planet.
消灭兽人自上一个星球以来就一直困扰着他们的那些“发光鱼”。

Way to go, {STR_LeaderName}! We always said that the only good jelly is goose jelly. Now we don’t have to play cat and mouse anymore and can concentrate on our favorite topic of fun times and merriment.[br/][br/]Oh, and Hoppity Hopkins over there is so grateful she insisted to join you scaly boys!
干得漂亮，{STR_LeaderName}！我们总说不会寄生的水母才是好水母。现在我们不必再玩猫捉老鼠的游戏了，我们可以把注意力集中在最有趣的话题和欢乐时光上了。[br/][br/]噢，对了，那边的那位霍普提·霍普金非常感激你们，她坚持要加入你们这些长着鳞片的家伙！
Story message. Speaker: "Therian Sharpshooter" (Therian, male) "Hoppity Hopkins" is the character name of a (female) Therian Bouncer unit.
Damn it, this would be a good moment for an emergency pickup, Jack. Just why did I allow you to take Tappels along – he may have been able to get me out of this!
该死，现在正是紧急撤离的好时机，杰克。这就是我让你带着塔贝尔斯一起来的原因，它也许能帮助我摆脱这里的困境！
Story message. Speaker: "Daiyu Jiang" (Vanguard, female) "Jack" is the first name of "Jack Gelder", a male Vanguard character. "Tappels" is the character name of a Vanguard PUG unit.
I am sorry, Colonel. Narrow escapes only happen in Dreamscape.[br/][br/]Now you die, human.
对不起，上校。死里逃生的情节只会发生在梦幻之境中。[br/][br/]现在你死定了，人类。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
By the Gauntlet of Empires! How could this happen? The Zhelezo Consortium must thrive without me now – avenge me, my comrades!
以帝国臂铠之名！这怎么可能？即使没有我，泽勒佐财团也将繁荣发展。为我复仇，兄弟姐妹们！
Short description of a diplomatic modifier between players.
Amazon Members of the ELOP Confederation
星球平等联盟亚马逊成员
Short description of a diplomatic modifier between players.
Short description of a casus belli.
Fall back, Marshal! Quickly! Today is not a good day for you to die…
快撤退，元帅！快！你可不能在这里死去……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Argh, that’s an easy thing to say, General, when you’re the one still out on the field having all the fun. Meanwhile, I might be stuck in the infirmary of our operation base for the rest of this mission.
呃啊，说得倒是轻巧，将军。毕竟你还在战场上玩得很开心，而我则可能会被困在行动基地的医务室里，直到这次任务结束。
